title: Colt: Boneheads MC
description: He knew what he wanted from life… until an unexpected baby changed everything.RALEIGHI just wanted to save the poor dog.I had no idea what it would do to my life.Now, I’ve got a hot biker breathing down my neck.I tell him I’m off-limits, but it’s not the kind of thing he cares about.And it turns out that I can’t resist him for long.Soon, I’m tied up in more ways than one.All I have are questions:Will we survive this war?Can I love a broken man?And how do I tell Colt that he’s about to welcome a baby on board?COLTA man’s dog is his best friend.I may be an outlaw, but I’m no different gun that respect.Raleigh didn’t know what she was getting into when she jumped feet-first into my life.But neither of us can ignore the sparks igniting between us.The thing is, a biker comes with baggage.My enemies are pounding at the door, trying to destroy everything I’ve ever loved.Can I keep the mother of my child safe from the men who want to kill me?
author: Naomi West
